name: Six Nights at Peter's
description:
It seems today that all you see, are cancelled fan games and endless developer drama, But where are those good old-fashioned values...But where are those good old-fashioned values On which we used to rely?

Lucky there's a family guy! Lucky there's a man who, Positively can do, All the things that make us, good and fun games!

He's our Family Guy

Six Nights at Peter's is a Family guy styled and themed FNaF fangame created by the minds behind the One Night with Spong series.

This game marks the beginning of the ONwS VOLUME 2 Saga!

This takes place during old Family Guy, back when Stewie wanted to kill Lois and take over the world.

Stewie, in another one of these plans, creates the ultimate weapon. A virus that could kill and mind control it's victims the moment it comes into contact with them. Unfortunely, the virus was unstable, and broke out of containment, killing the whole family including Stewie. Their spirits, being controlled by the virus, haunted the house. Stewie kept his conscious though, and became the virus' vessel.

Fast forward one year later, you play as Quagmire. There are ads appearing on TV telling people to come to the Griffins' house. Wanting to know more about these cruel ads and your friend's death overall, you break into his house. Only to find that the virus hasn't rested yet.

Can you survive Six Nights at Peter's?

Shoodigity - Creator, Main coder

FOX/DISNEY - owners of the family guy franchise

Seth MacFarlane - The creator and mastermind of Family Guy

BerryBerryQure - Artist, ideas

BeeMan88 - Composer, Tester

Medineer_gaming - Extra coder

Redeemer Studios - Extra coder, Artist, Designer of this page

Valdit Kishir - VA for Phone Guy

And YOU for playing!
